body.p: We the undersigned Citizens of Campbell Co Ky would respectfully represent that Jno F Hase of this County was at the present term of the Campbell Circuit Court tried and convicted of keeping a tippling house more then one year ago and fined Sixty Dollars and is now confined in the Jail of this county, that he is an exceedingly poor Man & industrious Man and a good citizen & has a wife who is partially in insane and has been confined in the Lunatic asylum hertofore, That he has five small helpless children who depend wholly upon his daily Earnings for their support.
We deem it a case truly deserving your Excellencys' Clemency & Pray that You remit his fine at once

Respectfully
Yours
J. Q. A. Foster
